version_description:
Discover the exciting world of Toy Story 4 as Woody and Bo Peep!
Meet brand new friends and some of your old favorites too! Enjoy lots of new storybooks featuring your favorite classic Disney characters!
Celebrate the 25th Anniversary of The Lion King with this awesome free event. Check-in to Rafiki's Tree of Life and each day you can enjoy a FREE new activity!

Explore the world of Disney and Pixar’s The Incredibles 2! Guide Frozone across the rooftops in New Urbem, create your own superhero costumes, play word games, read the storybook and much more! We think it's just... incredible.

Roar through the Pride Lands as Simba in the new The Lion King Realm! Discover The Lion King themed activities which stimulate learning, and interact with iconic characters from this magical world. Also, read the official The Lion King movie storybook - this 96-page, beautifully illustrated book features all the twists and turns, camaraderie, romance and betrayal as Simba grows from a cub to a King.

The ocean is in her soul and her soul is in the ocean. Moana’s arrived!

*NEW MOANA 3D REALM* Explore the Island of Motunui and set sail on the Pacific.

*NEW ACTIVITIES & FUN * Moana-themed puzzles, wordsearches and games.

*MAGICAL STORYBOOKS * An epic movie retelling, as well as three exclusive Moana short stories.

Mickey is feeling festive! Daily discoveries in Mickey’s House - for FREE USERS too!

Three new seasonal storybooks (Robin Hood, Sleeping Beauty and Monsters, Inc.) and an extra special soul-warming storybook coming on Christmas Day!
Snuggle up and get cosy with three new winter-themed classic storybooks. Short stories from Pocahontas, Bambi and Dumbo.
Nobody ever thinks about villains on Valentine's Day! Show some love to Captain Hook, Ursula and Maleficent in our Anti-Valentine’s update, with three new storybooks added.
Celebrate World Book Day with a new storybook, Frozen 2 - The New Librarian. Anna and Olaf volunteer to help out at Arendelle’s library and Olaf has some big ideas for the place!
New full-movie retelling storybook added: Raya and the Last Dragon. Raya and Tuk Tuk must find Kumandra’s last dragon, Sisu, in order to save their planet.

New FREE realm and storybook: Explore Agrabah as Aladdin and Jasmine, complete with iconic locations, friends and foes. Plus, re-experience this glorious tale with a 64-page full-movie storybook added!
Have an Egg-cellent Easter! Head over to the Spring garden in Mickey’s House for seasonal fun, plus we’ve added two new Easter storybooks from Pixar’s Cars and Snow White!
